statements: SELECT * FROM FloodRiskAssessment;
SELECT area_name, flood_risk_level FROM FloodRiskAssessment ORDER BY flood_risk_level DESC;
SELECT id, area_name FROM FloodRiskAssessment WHERE elevation > 100;
SELECT area_name, elevation, flood_risk_level FROM FloodRiskAssessment WHERE flood_risk_level = 3;
SELECT * FROM FloodRiskAssessment WHERE elevation BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM FloodRiskAssessment WHERE elevation > 100 ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT id, area_name, flood_risk_level FROM FloodRiskAssessment WHERE flood_risk_level = 3 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT area_name, elevation FROM FloodRiskAssessment WHERE flood_risk_level IN (1, 2) ORDER BY elevation DESC;
SELECT id, area_name, elevation, flood_risk_level FROM FloodRiskAssessment WHERE elevation < 50 AND flood_risk_level > 2;
SELECT area_name AS location, elevation * 2 AS double_elevation FROM FloodRiskAssessment WHERE elevation BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY double_elevation DESC;
SELECT * FROM flood_risk_areas;
SELECT area_name, elevation FROM flood_risk_areas WHERE risk_level='High';
SELECT area_id, area_name, elevation FROM flood_risk_areas ORDER BY elevation DESC;
SELECT area_name, elevation, risk_level FROM flood_risk_areas WHERE elevation > 100;
SELECT area_id, area_name, risk_level FROM flood_risk_areas WHERE area_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM flood_risk_areas;
SELECT area_name, elevation FROM flood_risk_areas WHERE risk_level='High';
SELECT area_name, elevation, data_date FROM flood_risk_areas JOIN elevation_data ON flood_risk_areas.area_id = elevation_data.area_id;
SELECT area_name, elevation FROM flood_risk_areas ORDER BY elevation DESC;
SELECT area_name, AVG(elevation) AS avg_elevation FROM elevation_data JOIN flood_risk_areas ON elevation_data.area_id = flood_risk_areas.area_id GROUP BY area_name HAVING AVG(elevation) > 50;
SELECT * FROM flood_risk_areas;
SELECT area_name, elevation FROM flood_risk_areas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT area_name FROM flood_risk_areas WHERE elevation > 100;
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_risk_level FROM flood_predictions ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT area_id, prediction_date, predicted_risk_level FROM flood_predictions WHERE area_id = 3 ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
SELECT area_id, area_name, elevation FROM flood_risk_areas WHERE elevation > 100 ORDER BY elevation DESC;
SELECT area_name, area_id FROM flood_risk_areas WHERE area_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM elevation_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 50.0 AND longitude BETWEEN -120.0 AND -110.0;
SELECT prediction_id, prediction_date, predicted_risk_level FROM flood_predictions WHERE prediction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;

SELECT area_id, area_name, elevation, prediction_date, predicted_risk_level FROM flood_risk_areas JOIN flood_predictions ON flood_risk_areas.area_id = flood_predictions.area_id WHERE elevation < 50 AND predicted_risk_level = 'High' ORDER BY elevation ASC, prediction_date ASC;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude, elevation FROM elevation_data;
SELECT * FROM flood_data WHERE risk_level > 3;
SELECT location, risk_factor FROM risk_areas ORDER BY risk_factor DESC;
SELECT id, location, warning_message FROM flood_warnings WHERE location='City A';
SELECT location, risk_level FROM flood_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, latitude, longitude, elevation FROM elevation_data ORDER BY elevation DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT location, risk_level FROM flood_data WHERE risk_level > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM flood_warnings WHERE location = 'Riverbank' AND warning_id > 100 ORDER BY warning_id LIMIT 5
SELECT id, location, risk_factor FROM risk_areas WHERE risk_factor BETWEEN 1.5 AND 3.5 ORDER BY location LIMIT 5
SELECT id, location, area_size FROM risk_areas WHERE area_size > 100 ORDER BY id LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM elevation_data;
SELECT location, elevation FROM elevation_data WHERE elevation > 1000 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, zone_name, flood_depth FROM flood_zones WHERE risk_assessment = 'High Risk';
SELECT * FROM flood_mapping ORDER BY zone_id ASC, elevation_id DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM flood_response_team WHERE team_size > 5 ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM elevation_data;
SELECT location, elevation FROM elevation_data WHERE elevation > 1000 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT zone_name, risk_assessment FROM flood_zones WHERE risk_assessment = 'High' ORDER BY zone_name DESC;
SELECT fr.id, fr.report_date, fr.report_text, ft.team_name FROM flood_reports fr JOIN flood_response_team ft ON fr.id = ft.team_id;

SELECT fz.zone_name, ed.location, ed.elevation FROM flood_mapping fm JOIN flood_zones fz ON fm.zone_id = fz.id JOIN elevation_data ed ON fm.elevation_id = ed.id WHERE fz.zone_name IN ('Zone A', 'Zone B') ORDER BY ed.elevation DESC;
